thread.title: Off-duty NYPD cop arrested for drunken driving in Queens
thread.title_full: Off-duty NYPD cop arrested for drunken driving in Queens

author: AIDAN MCLAUGHLIN
title: Off-duty NYPD cop arrested for drunken driving in Queens
text:
He was driving a 2012 Ford Mustang east on the turnpike when he swerved off the road and struck three parked cars, police sources said. (Alex_Schmidt/Getty Images/iStockphoto) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Friday, March 24, 2017, 8:26 AM 
An off-duty NYPD cop was arrested for drunken driving after he slammed into three parked cars in Queens early Friday, police said. 
Officer Harpreet Singh, 24, crashed on Union Turnpike near 188th St. in Fresh Meadows around 12:45 a.m., officials said. 
He was driving a 2012 Ford Mustang east on the turnpike when he swerved off the road and struck three parked cars, police sources said. 
No one was injured in the crash and Singh remained at the scene, according to police. 
Authorities charged him with driving while intoxicated and refusing to take a breath test. Join the Conversation:
